name: Schism (Volpanic!)
description:
Schism is a short platformer, made to be a short fun burst of a game with a bit of challenge.

Story

The player charterer has been tasked with answering a magic distress call from within the nearby forest. This game has 2 endings.

Controls

Controls can be remapped in the options menu

Arrow KeysUp, Down, Left, RightZJumpXAction / AttackA Switch weapon leftSSwitch weapon rightEnter Pause

The game has basic controller support (Controller can not be remapped).
